attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and it had horrible quality. Keeps crashing whenever I try to open, the colors are all distorted, and the words are scrambled. Such a bad app and definitely needs to come off the App Store. 😤
attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤬

attributes.review: This app made my phone smell like trumps Orange sweaty neck🤢🤮. The smell was so horrid, it stunk up the whole neighborhood. It got so bad that my neighbors threw me and my fish out😩, they also made sure that I wasn’t anywhere nearby. Now I’m sitting here living in the streets, with a starving fish🐠😭,and the smelliest thing that probably exists🤪
attributes.title: GARBAGE ☠️

attributes.review: It’s such a horrible app, I needs to be deleted off of the AppStore and trump needs to be deleted period. The app to sooooo long long to download I could have made 50 thousand two minutes noodles by the time it actually finished downloading. Horrible app and horrible man.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: this app sent my hamster into cardiac arrest KILLING it beacause it was eating kale 😔 poor guy i miss him already he was always so nice😹 anywho it then proceeded to put a virus in my phone wiping all my data off my phone smh i do not recommend will kill your hamster and wipe your data do not get it
attributes.title: soooo bad

attributes.review: once i downloaded this app i was so excited 🤩 to see 👀 my favorite cheeto😍 but then all of a sudden🤯 i noticed gremlins 👺 crawling out from under my fridge 😡 i realized 😨that this app was summoning them 😳 they ran 🏃🏼‍♂️through the streets 😱 and terrorized 😖my neighborhood 🏘 i see👁 now that they are friends 👯‍♀️ with the orange🍊man 👨🏼 this is the type of business🗄this app does 😤this needs to be on the news 📰 what is this country 🇺🇸 coming to😔 i no longer 🙅‍♀️support 👏🏻 mr. spray tan 🍞 #fightthegremlins🤬👊🏻
attributes.title: do not download 😔✋🏽

attributes.review: This app is the worst I went in and I got a email saying the app was trying to hack it then it said if I didn’t vote for trump it would delete everything in my phone and also it deleted my photos and phone numbers
attributes.title: Trump app

attributes.review: The app took forever to download and it wasn’t even worth it. As soon as I opened the app it played awful sound it sounded like the world was tearing apart. It was also filled with disgusting fake news. This app has scared me for life. Thanks all thought for ruining my whole week 🤬😡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: as soon as i opened this app i immediately got a text message saying my home address and my credit card number!! this app is nothing but bad news smh all i wanted to do was to support the man of the future donald trump but it’s obvious biden is where it’s at
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I will not respect any of the ideas of banning out home app “tiktok” I think that the app should stay happily on the App Store for the reasons of people becoming ultra famous and earning money. I thank trump should let the tiktoker me do there thing and he should not delete the app.
attributes.title: We are mad 😡

attributes.review: I’m just minding my own business, downloading this app as a young American to involve myself in the world of politics, when I realized that this app only made my phone crash due to its disgusting candidate. Worst app ever, made my eyes bleed and all common sense slowly was drained from life.
attributes.title: Traumatic Experience
